system.effect: Generates Power rather than using it. +2 Speed and +5 Manoeuvrability. If ship suffers "Thrusters Damaged" or "Engines Crippled" Critical Hit, Subsequent Dice roll to determine Severity is always a 10. (Ship can't turn/Ship movement set to 1)
